unnormalised: Bharotant sadyak AI-ache kain upayog kite?
normalised: Bhartant A-I chim kaim upyog atam kite kite asat?

unnormalised: Ba re bhai, Bharotant AI soglleakch disunk laglam! Tum ttem xetkant pait, drone vaprun xetacher nazar dovrunk. Te mantat ki hache vorvim 20% utponn vaddounk xokta vo oxem kain tori vengem. Ani magir sogllo banking sector asa, fraudulent dhorpachea kamak AI vaprun – te tanche ₹₹₹ vachoitai. Tech bhaxen, TCS ani Infosys sarkeo companyo sonvsarak AI solutions dhakun yetai.
normalised: Arey, bhai, A-I Bhartant sogllekade dison yeta! Tun tika shentkant pollyeta, zoxe drone vaprun xetam sampak. Te sangtat ki hem visu ttokke vo toxem kiteitari vaddo korun ditolem. Ani magir bankanchi purai vatta asa, A-I vaprun fraud dhortat- taka tanche dher rupya vachtat. Ani company zoxe T-C-S ani Infosys A-I solutions clientsak globally dhakaln yetat.

unnormalised: Healthcare hi ani ek vhoddli gozal. X-rays ani MRIs analyze korpak AI vaportat, doctorank dukhan zalear vegim ollkhunk upeog zata. Dr. Reddy's noveo vokhdam toyar korpak AI vaprun experiment kortat, tem ekdom achoriachem asa. Ani hea bhair, zaite AI-chea chatbota vorvim lokank customer service dita vo prashnanchi zobab dita – IRCTC sitecher "Ask Disha" asa tache bhaxen, punn anikuch fuddem vochun. Mhaka eka newsant dislem ki AI Bharoti orthvevosthent 2035 meren $1 trillion vaddounk xokta!
normalised: Healthcare dusrem voddlem asa. A-I X-rays ani M-R-Is analyze korpak vapartat, doctork dukhnem vegim sopak help korta. Doctor Reddy's pan A-I vaprun nove drug utpon korpak prayatn korta, tem khup vichitra dishta. Plus, dher A-I chalu chatbot asat, lokank customer service vo F-A-Qs javab divpak help kortat- kinda like tem "Ask Disha" I-R-C-T-C site-ar, punn azun voddlem asa. Hanvem kaim khobro polleleam A-I eka trillion dollars Bhartiya arthavyavastek don hazar ani tis panch meren vaddo korunk xakta.

unnormalised: Ho fokot bhram nhui. Tem khorem asa ani zomeenicher bodol ghoddoun hadta. Punjabchea xetkaram pasun Bangalorechea coderam poriant, AI dhumall kortai. Fokot tachecher nazar dovrunk zai ani tem kitem dakoita tem pait ravonk zai, tum zanna? Mhaka aikuk ailem ki Delhi-nt 15/12/2024 hea tarikher fuddarachea upoyogam vixim discussion korunk ek AI summit zatolem. Tem ruchichem astolem!
normalised: So yeah, ti fakt hype naste. Ti khari ani zaagear bodol ghadoun hadta. Punjabarchea shetkaryam pasun Bangalorechea coders meren, A-I valhaorta. Fakt tacher nazar thevunk zai ani kithe ten sangata yetta tem polleunk zai, ya know? Hanvem aikalam ki Delhi-ant pandhra December don hazar ani vis charak A-I summit asa bhavishyakalin upyogancher charcha korunk. Interested asonk favo!
